ctu_text:
> **Evaluation Process** **Step 1:** On receipt of the complete application, the SPC shall inspect and verify the contents of the application. Based on the received documents, SPC will scrutinize and perform necessary due diligence on the expenses incurred. **Step 2:** The SPC shall recommend the application for the sanction of reimbursement of the costs.
> **Notification** The applications received by the SPC shall be evaluated and approval or rejection shall be notified within 45 days from receipt of the application by the SPC.
